2. Intellectual Property Rights

Unless otherwise indicated, all content on the Site, including text, graphics, images, and logos, is the property of The Life Place and protected under South African copyright and trademark law. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use content without prior written consent.

3. User Representations

By using the Site, you represent that all information you provide is truthful and accurate, and that your use of the Site will comply with applicable South African law.

4. User Registration

You may be required to register to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login details and for all activities under your account.

5. Prohibited Activities

  • Using the Site for unlawful purposes.
  • Uploading harmful code or content.
  • Harassing, threatening, or abusing others.
  • Infringing on intellectual property rights.

6. User Generated Contributions

If you submit content (e.g., comments, media, testimonials), you grant The Life Place a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use such content for ministry and promotional purposes.

7. Third-Party Websites and Content

Our Site may link to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the accuracy, safety, or policies of those websites and encourage you to review their terms and conditions.

8. Privacy Policy

We value your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which governs how we collect and use your information in compliance with the South African Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA).

9. Modifications and Interruptions

We reserve the right to update, modify, or discontinue any part of the Site at our discretion, without prior notice. We will not be held liable for downtime or unavailability.

10. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, The Life Place is not liable for damages or losses resulting from your use of the Site, including errors, downtime, or third-party links.

11. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless The Life Place, its leaders, and volunteers against any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the Site.

12. Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Republic of South Africa. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Johannesburg, South Africa.

13. Contact Us
